actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-385, by Mr. Derrick.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 714. Waiving all points of order against the conference report.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 127.

official_title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 714) to provide funding for the resolution of failed savings associations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 714 (providing funding for the resolution of failed savings associations).

titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 714) to provide funding for the resolution of failed savings associations, and for other purposes.
